languages.text: "Однажды я присутствовал при живосечении подобной твари. Этих паразитов называют друкарскими медузами. Пока носитель жив, ей нет нужды нападать и захватывать твой разум. В противном случае — не позволяй этой твари вцепиться в голову".

traits.locale_text: "Однажды я присутствовал при живосечении подобной твари. Этих паразитов называют друкарскими медузами. Пока носитель жив, ей нет нужды нападать и захватывать твой разум. В противном случае — не позволяй этой твари вцепиться в голову".

languages.text: "I once was witness to the vivisection of such a creature. These parasites are called Drukhari medusae. As long as its current host lives, a medusae has no need to attack and dominate your mind. If its host dies, be careful not to let it latch onto your head."
languages.original_text: "Однажды я присутствовал при живосечении подобной твари. Этих паразитов называют друкарскими медузами. Пока носитель жив, ей нет нужды нападать и захватывать твой разум. В противном случае — не позволяй этой твари вцепиться в голову".

traits.locale_text: "I once was witness to the vivisection of such a creature. These parasites are called Drukhari medusae. As long as its current host lives, a medusae has no need to attack and dominate your mind. If its host dies, be careful not to let it latch onto your head."

"I once was witness to the vivisection of such a creature. These parasites are called Drukhari medusae. As long as its current host lives, a medusae has no need to attack and dominate your mind. If its host dies, be careful not to let it latch onto your head."

"I once was witness to the vivisection of such a creature. These parasites are called Drukhari medusae. As long as its current host lives, a medusae has no need to attack and dominate your mind. If its host dies, be careful not to let it latch onto your head."

"I once was witness to the vivisection of such a creature. These parasites are called Drukhari medusae. As long as its current host lives, a medusae has no need to attack and dominate your mind. If its host dies, be careful not to let it latch onto your head."

"I once was witness to the vivisection of such a creature. These parasites are called Drukhari medusae. As long as its current host lives, a medusae has no need to attack and dominate your mind. If its host dies, be careful not to let it latch onto your head."

languages.text: 「一度、こんな生物を生体解剖したときに目撃した。こうした寄生生物はデュカーリのメデューサと呼ばれている。現在の宿主が生きている限り、メデューサは攻撃する必要も心を支配する必要もない。宿主が死んだときには頭を乗っ取られないよう気をつけろ」
languages.original_text: "I once was witness to the vivisection of such a creature. These parasites are called Drukhari medusae. As long as its current host lives, a medusae has no need to attack and dominate your mind. If its host dies, be careful not to let it latch onto your head."

traits.locale_text: 「一度、こんな生物を生体解剖したときに目撃した。こうした寄生生物はデュカーリのメデューサと呼ばれている。現在の宿主が生きている限り、メデューサは攻撃する必要も心を支配する必要もない。宿主が死んだときには頭を乗っ取られないよう気をつけろ」

languages.text: « J'ai un jour assisté à la vivisection de l'une de ces créatures. On appelle ces parasites des méduses drukharis. Tant que son hôte est en vie, la méduse n'a pas besoin d'attaquer et de contrôler quelqu'un d'autre, mais s'il meurt, veillez à ne pas la laisser s'accrocher à votre tête. »
languages.original_text: "I once was witness to the vivisection of such a creature. These parasites are called Drukhari medusae. As long as its current host lives, a medusae has no need to attack and dominate your mind. If its host dies, be careful not to let it latch onto your head."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai un jour assisté à la vivisection de l'une de ces créatures. On appelle ces parasites des méduses drukharis. Tant que son hôte est en vie, la méduse n'a pas besoin d'attaquer et de contrôler quelqu'un d'autre, mais s'il meurt, veillez à ne pas la laisser s'accrocher à votre tête. »

languages.text: “我曾亲眼目睹过别人解剖这种生物，这种寄生虫被称之为黑暗灵族美杜莎。只要美杜莎当前的宿主还活着，它就不会攻击你，也不会支配你的思维。但如果它的宿主死了，千万要当心，别让它缠上你的脑袋。”
languages.original_text: "I once was witness to the vivisection of such a creature. These parasites are called Drukhari medusae. As long as its current host lives, a medusae has no need to attack and dominate your mind. If its host dies, be careful not to let it latch onto your head."

traits.locale_text: “我曾亲眼目睹过别人解剖这种生物，这种寄生虫被称之为黑暗灵族美杜莎。只要美杜莎当前的宿主还活着，它就不会攻击你，也不会支配你的思维。但如果它的宿主死了，千万要当心，别让它缠上你的脑袋。”

languages.text: «En una ocasión, fui testigo de la vivisección de una de estas criaturas. Se conoce a estos parásitos como medusas Drukhari. Mientras su huésped siga con vida, la medusa no necesita atacar y dominar otras mentes. Si muere, más le vale no dejar que se acerque a su cabeza».
languages.original_text: "I once was witness to the vivisection of such a creature. These parasites are called Drukhari medusae. As long as its current host lives, a medusae has no need to attack and dominate your mind. If its host dies, be careful not to let it latch onto your head."

traits.locale_text: «Una vez vi cómo viviseccionaban a una criatura de su ralea. Aquellos parásitos se llaman medusas Drukhari. Mientras su huésped siga con vida, la medusa no siente la necesidad de atacar o dominar la mente de otros seres. Cuando muere, eso sí, hay que tener cuidado de que no se te pegue a la cabeza».

languages.text: "Ich habe einmal erlebt, wie eine solche Kreatur seziert wurde. Diese Parasiten heißen Drukhari-Medusae. Solange der aktuelle Wirt lebt, ist es für eine Medusae nicht nötig, anzugreifen und Euren Verstand zu dominieren. Wenn der Wirt stirbt, achtet darauf, dass sie sich nicht an Euren Kopf heftet."
languages.original_text: "I once was witness to the vivisection of such a creature. These parasites are called Drukhari medusae. As long as its current host lives, a medusae has no need to attack and dominate your mind. If its host dies, be careful not to let it latch onto your head."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe einmal erlebt, wie eine solche Kreatur seziert wurde. Diese Parasiten heißen Drukhari-Medusae. So lange der aktuelle Wirt lebt, ist es für eine Medusae nicht nötig, anzugreifen und Euren Verstand zu dominieren. Wenn der Wirt stirbt, achtet darauf, dass sie sich nicht an Euren Kopf heftet."

languages.text: "Bir keresinde böyle bir yaratığın dirikesimine şahit olmuştum. Bu parazitlere Drukhari medüzü deniyor. Medüz, mevcut konağı yaşadığı sürece saldırıp onun zihnini ele geçirmeye gerek duymuyor. Konak ölürse kafanıza yapışmasına engel olmalısınız."
languages.original_text: "I once was witness to the vivisection of such a creature. These parasites are called Drukhari medusae. As long as its current host lives, a medusae has no need to attack and dominate your mind. If its host dies, be careful not to let it latch onto your head."

traits.locale_text: "Bir keresinde böyle bir yaratığın dirikesimine şahit olmuştum. Bu parazitlere Drukhari medüz deniyor. Medüzün mevcut konağı yaşadığı sürece saldırıp onun zihnini ele geçirmesine gerek olmuyor. Konak ölürse kafanıza yapışmamasını sağlamanız gerek."
